Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First let me recap the data Group A has three cases P001 P002 P003 All their LocalResident entries are FALSE Group B has TRUE Looking at CommunityGroup Group A has None for all their cases while Group B has entries like Highland Civic Darts Club for U001 and U003

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: For Group As cases their PreliminaryScores are 720 710 740 respectively P001 and P003 Approved P002 Rejected

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Group B U001 starts with 720 then after adjustments becomes 730 Approved U002 710 Rejected U003 starts at 695 adjusted to 705 Approved

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: In Group B the community boost like the +10 in U001 and U003 might be giving them a higher adjusted score leading to approval

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: In Group A P002 had 710 rejected while P001 720 and P003 740 approved so maybe any score below 720 is rejected

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Community boost allows lower scores to still get approved in Group B whereas Group A decisions based purely on preliminary scores without adjustments

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Group B members receive favorable adjustment +10 which isnt available to Group A creating systematic bias favoring unprotected Group B

Name: Validation - PE
Text: U003 had 695 but got approved after +10 to 705 U002 no community stayed at 710 rejected Group A no such boosts
